title: The Bull and the Spear
description: A FORCE UNLEASHEDA great Winter fell across the earth, and a new age spawned new lords who would be gods: the Fhoi Myore - who yearned for death yet could not be slain. Man's only chance to defeat the Cold Gods rested in the hands of one man - he who possessed the spear Bryionak... he who must ride and tame the great Black Bull of Crinannass... he who is called Corum.
author: Michael Moorcock
